title: Vertigo Scooters $23.99 Shipped (Reg. Up to $39.99) – TODAY ONLY
content: WOW! Save big today on  Vertigo scooters for as low as only $23.99 (reg. up to $39.99)! Plus, shipping is free for Staples Rewards Members and you will snag an additional 2-5% cash back. Or, you may be able to opt for free in-store pick up, if available near you. Now is the time to grab gifts and out them away for Christmas! You can find a ton of great deals, coupons, savings, codes and freebies on our Home Page.
